name: Go to the Abyss
description:
Description

Annie and her father lived quietly in the forest, but one day her father was kidnapped, leaving a trail of his notes, which led to the abyss. The abyss was home to monstrous creatures, in which few dared venture. But Annie had no choice, and she left to save her father.

Mecanics

Sidescrolling platform game, which requires the player agility to destroy enemies. The goal is to reach the end of the stage.

During the stage there are stones and pieces of wood that can be used to attack enemies, in addition to the jump.

Player controls:

Move the character movement using directional arrows or AWSD on the computer keyboard. J and K keys to attack and throw rocks at enemies, or mouse to access interface buttons.

Changes after first version

-Correction of bugs in interface, in executable for Web, in spikes, and in controls (J to attack and K to throw rocks);

-Songs to repeat.

Credits:

Game developed by Felipe Felix and Jessica Saito at Ludum Dare 48, 2021, with the theme "Deep and Depper". Copyrighted arts.

Felipe Felix - https://itch.io/profile/felippefelix

Jessica Saito - https://jessicas25.itch.io/

External resources

The sound effects used in the game were from the "8-bit / 16-bit Sound Effects" package created by @JDWasabi and made available on the itch.io website (https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit- sound-effects-pack).

The songs used in the game are from the "Free Music Loop Bundle" package created by Tallbeard Studios and made available on the website itch.io (https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle).
